type.name: Kywd
type.summary: Represents a form of type KYWD.

property.name: Color
property.summary: Gets or sets the color of this Keyword.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether a form has been tagged with a text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with a text.
